Dialogs.Text: SecurPink1850: So, what is your group exactly?
MsMaki95: Well, we are a group that is, like the name says, interested in lost software, movies and many other things. ^-^
MsMaki95: Things that people remember existed, but can't be found anymore. u-u
SecurPink1850: You are like a lost and found group, basically.
MsMaki95: That's a cold way to put it but, yes. o-o
SecurPink1850: Why do you do it?
MsMaki95: It's interesting, you find something new every day. And well, it feels like recording history. c:
Thomas B: Basically, a lot of users with a lot of free time. (Pending to continue)
